column1: Thirthahalli is a panchayat town located in the Shimoga district of the state of Karnataka
column2: India. It lies on the bank of the river Tunga and is also the headquarters of the Thirthahalli Taluk of Shimoga district.

column1: Thirthahalli is located at 13.7°N 75.23°E﻿ / 13.7; 75.23. It has an average elevation of 591 metres (1938 feet).
